我們在天上的母：願人都尊契媽的名為聖。
願契媽的國降臨，願契媽的電動車馳騁在地上，
如同爆升在天上。我們盼望的升幅，
求契媽今日賜給我們，又求饒恕石仔拋售的罪，
因為我們饒恕得罪SH的人。
不叫我們遇見破壞性創新，拯救我們脫離短炒。
離開方舟的叛徒，定必受到地獄之火的懲罰。
因為坐貨、賺錢、移民，
全是契媽的子民，直到永遠。阿們。

(Bloomberg) -- Hedge funds increased positions in financials to the least underweight since the first quarter of 2013, part of a “small shift toward value,” Goldman’s Ben Snider wrote in a note analyzing the holdings of 814 hedge funds with $2.4 trillion of gross equity positions at the start of the fourth quarter.
On the other hand, funds reduced overweight exposure to internet retail, modestly lifted exposures to cyclicals, and reduced concentration in growth stocks in 3Q, including a net reduction in ownership of Amazon and Tesla, he said
TSLA dropped from Goldman’s “VIP list” of most popular hedge fund long positions
Other findings:
VIP list of 50 stocks that appear most often among the top 10 holdings of fundamentally-driven hedge funds saw a ninth consecutive quarter with the same top five stocks: AMZN, FB, MSFT, BABA, GOOGL
List has 14 new constituents: BAC, CHNG, EXPE, FDX, FE, GLIBA, GPN, IAC, LSXMK, MELI, PTON, UBER, VAR, WFC
NOTE: Earlier, Hedge Funds Buy Wells Fargo in Financial Services: 13F
Basket has outperformed the S&P 500 in 62% of quarters since 2001, Snider said
Health care represents the largest sector net exposure, at 21%, and the largest overweight, taking over from consumer discretionary
Info tech is the largest underweight relative to the Russell 3000 (-766 bps), but funds added software and services industries
Big bank stocks slipped in premarket trading on Friday, with BofA and Wells Fargo down 0.5%, JPMorgan down 0.3% and Citigroup down 0.1%
NOTE: Earlier, Tesla’s S&P 500 Debut May Spark $8 Billion Demand, Goldman Says
NOTE: Nov. 18, Financial Stocks Rally as Jefferies Turns Bullish Through 2021
Nov. 17, Square Climbs With Hedge Fund Buys, Survey on Cash App Growth

(Bloomberg) -- Hedge funds increased positions in financials to the least underweight since the first quarter of 2013, part of a “small shift toward value,” Goldman’s Ben Snider wrote in a note analyzing the holdings of 814 hedge funds with $2.4 trillion of gross equity positions at the start of the fourth quarter.
On the other hand, funds reduced overweight exposure to internet retail, modestly lifted exposures to cyclicals, and reduced concentration in growth stocks in 3Q, including a net reduction in ownership of Amazon and Tesla, he said
TSLA dropped from Goldman’s “VIP list” of most popular hedge fund long positions
Other findings:
VIP list of 50 stocks that appear most often among the top 10 holdings of fundamentally-driven hedge funds saw a ninth consecutive quarter with the same top five stocks: AMZN, FB, MSFT, BABA, GOOGL
List has 14 new constituents: BAC, CHNG, EXPE, FDX, FE, GLIBA, GPN, IAC, LSXMK, MELI, PTON, UBER, VAR, WFC
NOTE: Earlier, Hedge Funds Buy Wells Fargo in Financial Services: 13F
Basket has outperformed the S&P 500 in 62% of quarters since 2001, Snider said
Health care represents the largest sector net exposure, at 21%, and the largest overweight, taking over from consumer discretionary
Info tech is the largest underweight relative to the Russell 3000 (-766 bps), but funds added software and services industries
Big bank stocks slipped in premarket trading on Friday, with BofA and Wells Fargo down 0.5%, JPMorgan down 0.3% and Citigroup down 0.1%
NOTE: Earlier, Tesla’s S&P 500 Debut May Spark $8 Billion Demand, Goldman Says
NOTE: Nov. 18, Financial Stocks Rally as Jefferies Turns Bullish Through 2021
Nov. 17, Square Climbs With Hedge Fund Buys, Survey on Cash App Growth
